DataElement.preferredName: Gastrointestinal Secondary Surgical Procedure Other Specify Text
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Free text that describes other types of secondary gastrointestinal surgical procedures that have not been previously listed.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Information pertaining to the stomach and intestines and a diagnostic or treatment procedure performed by manual and/or instrumental means, often involving an incision and the removal or replacement of a diseased organ or tissue; of or relating to or involving or used in surgery or requiring or amenable to treatment by surgery._Derived as a result of a primary condition; not direct or immediate; of second rank or importance or value.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: (GAS-tro-in-TES-tih-nul) GI.  Refers to the stomach and intestines.

Concepts.definition: Pertaining to the stomach and intestines.
